column4: I have installed notepad++ through wine, maybe a better question for winehq, but thought i would ask here, is there a way to right click on files and open through notepad++?
you use wine to run a text editor!!!?? o.0
you bet...gedit doesn't have all the features as notepad++ that i need
try one of thwe other 10 thousans editors for linux....
you may try scite ( notepad++ is based on it )
try passing a fsck to the partition first
fsck?
filesystem check
Filesystem revision too high while trying to open /dev/sda1. The filesystem revision is apparantely too high for this verion of e2fsck or the filesystem superblock is corrupt
try with a different superblock
like sda2?
no; « sudo e2fsck -b 32768 /dev/sdxx »
replace xx with the letter number of the partition
it gave me usage commands
Superblock has an invalid journal (inode 8). Clear <y>?
should I hit Y?
how its going?
hi
e2fsck fixed the partition ?
yes :)
should I think about replacing my hdd now? Thinking because of this issue it might be bad?
hard to say; we do not know why the filesystem got corrupted... check SMART status ( health) . System>Admin...>disk utilitie
kk, again, thank you for the help, you don't know how much headaches you saved me...
